org.apache.cassandra.repair

Class LocalSyncTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture<SyncStat>
      • org.apache.cassandra.repair.SyncTask
        • org.apache.cassandra.repair.LocalSyncTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.FutureCallback<StreamState>, com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<SyncStat>, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<SyncStat>, StreamEventHandler

    public class LocalSyncTask
extends SyncTask
implements StreamEventHandler
    LocalSyncTask performs streaming between local(coordinator) node and remote replica.

      Starts sending/receiving our list of differences to/from the remote endpoint: creates a callback that will be called out of band once the streams complete.
